name: Image Filter (Jungle Book)
author: Lee Graber & Ang Gao
description: Lets you display an image, draw polygons in the image and then use those polygons as filters on a sheet in the viz.

name: Display Images
author: Geraldine Zanolli
description: Display one or more images selected on a dashboard

name: Dynamic Parameters
author: Keshia Rose
description: A Tableau Extension to add dynamic parameter capabilities to Tableau dashboards.

name: Tableaufans.com’s Write Back Extension
author: Timo Tautenhahn
description: Tableaufans.com’s Write Back Extension is a downloadable extension that allows you to write back to your MySQL database.
